title: EMPLOYED TO SERVE Drop New Record, Fallen Star, and Debut Music Video for "Whose Side Are You On?" feat. Jesse Leach (KILLSWITCH ENGAGE)

html:
Latest News

EMPLOYED TO SERVE Drop New Record, Fallen Star, and Debut Music Video for "Whose Side Are You On?" feat. Jesse Leach (KILLSWITCH ENGAGE)

Employed To Serve are making waves over in the UK with their brand new record, Fallen Star.

UK metal band Employed To Serve have just released their brand new record, Fallen Star, via Spinefarm Records this past Friday (25th of April) after the completion of their UK headlining tour.

The record includes collaborations with Lorna Shore's Will Ramos and Killswitch Engage's Jesse Leach, the latter which the band is shining a spotlight on with a brand new music video for their single together, "Whose Side Are You On?," which you can check out below.

It's the Employed to Serve's first full-length release since their 2021 record, Conquering, which received a deluxe edition back in 2023.

You can get your copy of Fallen Star here.
